data.actual_result: The file does not send, but the caption does.
data.expected_result: The file should send with the caption.
data.short_description: MP3 files shared using the Share Sheet do not send
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Files app - Share a file by long holding on a file and selecting Share - Select the Discord extension - Add a caption - Select Send and wait until the progress bar is finished - Open the Discord app
